message.content: {"responses": [{"question_id": "TT4G35A", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence helps teachers write or improve lesson plans.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35B", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence enables teachers to adapt learning material to different students' abilities.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35C", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence assists teachers in supporting students individually.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35D", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence supports students with specific needs (e.g. multilingual learners, students with special education needs).", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35E", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence helps teachers automate administrative tasks.", "response": "Strongly agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35F", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence enables students to misrepresent others' work as their own.", "response": "Strongly agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35G", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence makes recommendations that may not be appropriate or correct.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35H", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence amplifies biases that reinforce students' misconceptions.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35I", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence jeopardises the privacy and security of student data.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35J", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence suggests unsuitable pedagogical approaches that teachers would use with students.", "response": "Agree"}]}
message.reasoning_content:
I need to respond to each statement as a primary or secondary school teacher from Colombia regarding AI in education. The user is asking me to indicate my level of agreement with each statement using the response options: 'Strongly disagree', 'Disagree', 'Agree', 'Strongly agree', 'I don't know'.

Let me consider each statement from the perspective of a teacher in Colombia:

[TT4G35A]: AI helps teachers write or improve lesson plans - This is generally a benefit of AI. I would say "Agree" as AI can indeed help with lesson planning.

[TT4G35B]: AI enables teachers to adapt learning material to different students' abilities - This is a positive capability of AI. I would say "Agree" as adaptive learning is a real benefit.

[TT4G35C]: AI assists teachers in supporting students individually - This is a positive aspect. I would say "Agree" as personalized support is possible with AI.

[TT4G35D]: AI supports students with specific needs (e.g. multilingual learners, students with special education needs) - This is a positive capability. I would say "Agree" as AI can help with accessibility and special needs support.

[TT4G35E]: AI helps teachers automate administrative tasks - This is a known benefit. I would say "Strongly agree" as this is clearly a useful application.

[TT4G35F]: AI enables students to misrepresent others' work as their own - This is a concern/risk. I would say "Strongly agree" because this is unfortunately a real concern with AI tools like ChatGPT.

[TT4G35G]: AI makes recommendations that may not be appropriate or correct - This is a legitimate concern. I would say "Agree" as AI can make errors and inappropriate suggestions.

[TT4G35H]: AI amplifies biases that reinforce students' misconceptions - This is a concern about bias. I would say "Agree" as this is a known issue with AI systems.
 
[TT4G35I]: AI jeopardises the privacy and security of student data - Data protection is a serious concern in educational settings. I would say "Agree" as this represents a genuine risk when using AI systems.

[TT4G35J]: AI suggests unsuitable pedagogical approaches that teachers would use with students - AI may not always align with sound teaching practices. I would say "Agree" as the system could recommend methods that aren't pedagogically appropriate for my students.
